articles.author: Maya Yang
articles.title: Bankman-Fried planned to buy Nauru and build apocalypse bunker – lawsuit - The Guardian
articles.description: Lawsuit filed against FTX founder, 31, includes memo that detailed plans to purchase Pacific island in case world came to an end
articles.content: The disgraced cryptocurrency mogul Sam Bankman-Fried, who founded the FTX exchange, had planned to purchase the small Pacific island nation of Nauru in case the world came to an end, according to a n… [+3602 chars]
